nosotros.title: About us
nosotros.p1: We are a law firm specialized in business law, focused on the innovation and consolidation of companies. We provide legal services to boost and strengthen our clients’ ideas, aligned with their business model.
nosotros.p2: We offer comprehensive legal counsel with a 360° approach, based on legal instrumentation, structuring, and legal engineering. With over 11 years of experience, we have advised and consolidated companies across sectors such as finance, food industry, real estate, construction, hospitality, hydrocarbons, agriculture, and mining. Our corporate legal services include civil, commercial, corporate, contractual, labor, financial, industrial and intellectual property law, estate planning, and AML compliance.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: We provide specialized corporate legal services to consolidate companies across different sectors with efficiency and professionalism. We apply legal engineering to address specific needs with strategic solutions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be a benchmark in corporate legal services, recognized for our ability to consolidate and strengthen companies. Through research, innovation, problem-solving, and adaptability to the business environment, we aim to contribute to our country’s economic and social development.

valores.title: OUR VALUES
valores.general: We highlight our commitment to integrity, professionalism, responsibility, and ethics in every legal service we provide.

confianza.title: TRUST
confianza.desc: We build legal certainty in every interaction, communicating clearly and delivering on our promises.

lealtad.title: LOYALTY
lealtad.desc: We act with genuine commitment to our clients and their goals, always protecting their interests.

honestidad.title: HONESTY
honestidad.desc: We are transparent and straightforward. We state what is viable and what is not, with sound reasoning and professional ethics.

responsabilidad.title: RESPONSIBILITY
responsabilidad.desc: We handle each matter with discipline, timely follow-up, and accountability at all times.

experiencia: General Director of RCCO Abogados, he holds a Law degree from the Instituto Tecnológico Superior de Sinaloa and a postgraduate degree in Law of Obligations and Contracts from Universidad Panamericana, Guadalajara Campus. His experience spans various areas such as commercial, corporate, civil, labor, and corporate law. His leadership within the firm enables him to provide comprehensive solutions to clients across diverse business sectors.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with more than 10 years of experience in industrial and intellectual property. He has collaborated across various sectors such as real estate, construction, hospitality, and services. In addition to being a partner at the firm, he currently serves as Chairman of the Board of Directors, a role that allows him to apply his strategic vision in both the legal and business spheres.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with more than 12 years of experience in the corporate field. He specializes in drafting and reviewing commercial company contracts, as well as advising on legal strategies. He is currently a Partner Attorney at the firm, where he contributes his extensive experience to high-impact legal decision-making for corporate clients.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with a postgraduate degree in Law of Obligations and Contracts from Universidad Panamericana. He has 10 years of experience advising companies, primarily in the communications, services, hospitality, construction, and finance sectors. In his role as Senior Attorney, he specializes in corporate and contract law, as well as compliance with anti-money laundering regulations.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Business Law at Universidad Anáhuac. As a Junior Attorney, she has worked in various areas of law, including civil, commercial, corporate, anti-money laundering compliance, and industrial property. Her multidisciplinary approach allows her to adapt to the legal needs of diverse sectors.

Law graduate from the Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, with a postgraduate degree in Mediation and Alternative Dispute Resolution from UNAM. She has over 10 years of experience, particularly in matters related to gender-based violence, health law, environmental law, and conciliation procedures. As an Attorney at the firm, she specializes in corporate, labor, and civil law, providing support to clients in complex situations.

servicios.title: Legal Services
servicios.placeholder: Select a service on the right to see the details here.

societario.title: Corporate Law
societario.summary: We design and optimize your company’s legal structure to protect shareholders, ensure corporate control, and facilitate growth.
bullets: Incorporation, merger, spin-off, and transformation of companies
Issuance of share certificates and corporate books

mercantil.title: Commercial Law
mercantil.summary: We advise on commercial operations, litigation, and contracts, ensuring your transactions are legally secure.

civil.title: Civil Law
civil.summary: We resolve disputes related to property, obligations, and private contracts that directly affect your business.
bullets: Movable and real estate property matters

planeacion.title: Estate & Wealth Planning
planeacion.summary: We protect your business and family assets through legal strategies that ensure their preservation and orderly transfer.

laboral.title: Employment Law for Businesses
laboral.summary: We design solid employment structures that prevent disputes with employees and ensure compliance with labor regulations.
bullets: Employment contracts, internal policies, and bylaws

propiedad_industrial.title: Industrial & Intellectual Property
propiedad_industrial.summary: We register and protect trademarks, patents, and copyrights, safeguarding your company’s most valuable intangible assets.
bullets: Protection of innovations and creative works

fideicomisos.title: Trusts
fideicomisos.summary: We create tailored trust structures to manage and protect assets with legal security and flexibility.
bullets: Definition of trust terms and parties

pld.title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML)
pld.summary: We implement legal policies and controls to comply with anti-money laundering regulations.

due_diligence.title: Corporate Due Diligence
due_diligence.summary: We analyze the legal standing of companies and projects to minimize risks before investing, acquiring, or partnering.
bullets: Comprehensive legal, financial, and operational analysis
Support in mergers, acquisitions, and partnerships

sociedades_financieras.title: Creation of Financial Entities
sociedades_financieras.summary: We incorporate and regulate financial entities under the appropriate legal framework to operate in the sector.
bullets: Incorporation of SOFOM, SOFIPO, and fintech companies
Procedures before CNBV, Banxico, and CONDUSEF
Governance, internal control, and operational licenses

contratos_financieros.title: Financial Contracts
contratos_financieros.summary: We draft and review credit, investment, and guarantee contracts to safeguard your financial operations.
bullets: Negotiation and structuring of complex transactions

cumplimiento_regulatorio.title: Regulatory Compliance
cumplimiento_regulatorio.summary: We ensure your company operates in accordance with industry regulations and avoids sanctions or legal contingencies.
bullets: Representation before authorities and legislative monitoring

placeholder.title: Explore our sectors
placeholder.text: Hover over each hexagon for an interactive effect and click to view detailed sector information. Optimized design for desktop and mobile.

entretenimiento.title: Entertainment Industry
entretenimiento.desc: Specialized legal advice to protect and maximize the value of your creative and intellectual assets.
bullets: Talent, representation, production, distribution, and sponsorship contracts
Contracts for directing artistic works and/or content creation
Registration of characters, stage names, and artistic works (INDAUTOR/IMPI)
Negotiation with platforms and advertising compliance for events and content

agricola.title: Agricultural Sector
agricola.desc: Specialized legal services for the business agricultural sector.
bullets: Regularization of water and land use
Regularization of residency or ejidatario status
Acquisition of rights over ejido land
Supply and export contracts with phytosanitary verification
Commercial contracts for sales of future goods or expectations

construccion.title: Construction Sector
construccion.desc: Comprehensive legal advice on construction projects and operations.
bullets: Construction contracts (EPC, unit prices), subcontracts, and bonds
Prevention and management of claims and labor risks
Legal advice on real estate law applied to construction
Advisory on infrastructure projects and public-private partnerships (PPP)

inmobiliario.title: Real Estate Sector
inmobiliario.desc: Specialized legal services for real estate projects and transactions.
bullets: Advisory and drafting of purchase-sale and lease agreements

financiero.title: Financial Sector
financiero.desc: Legal services for the incorporation, regulation, and operation of financial entities.
bullets: Advisory on incorporation and regulation of SOFOM, SOFIPO, and fintech; liaison with CNBV/Banxico
Credit, guarantee, and debt structuring contracts
AML/CFT, corporate governance, and personal data

alimentario.title: Food Industry
alimentario.desc: Comprehensive legal services for companies in the food industry.
bullets: Registrations, notices, and compliance with COFEPRIS and COEPRIS
Advisory on compliance with labeling standards such as NOM-051
Drafting and reviewing contracts with suppliers, maquila, distribution, and retailers
Intellectual property advisory for brands and recipes
Advisory on labor matters specific to the food sector
Disposal of damaged or spoiled goods
Advisory on foreign trade for importing and exporting food products
Negotiation and drafting of confidentiality agreements for formulas and processes
Financing advisory for food industry projects
Compliance audits throughout the supply chain
Advisory on consumer personal data protection
Representation before PROFECO in complaints and disputes with consumers

minero.title: Mining Industry
minero.desc: Legal advice on concessions, contracts, and environmental compliance in the mining sector.
bullets: Concessions, transfers, and easements; agreements with communities
Environmental permits (SEMARNAT), impact, and industrial safety

turismo.title: Hospitality and Tourism
turismo.desc: Legal services for the hotel and tourism sector in operations, contracts, and regulatory compliance.
bullets: Hotel operation, franchise, and management contracts
Legal advisory on timeshare contracts and services
Advisory and representation before PROFECO (Federal Consumer Protection Agency)
Advisory on foreign investment in the hotel sector

ubicacion.title: Contact Information
ubicacion.subtitle: Find us easily and get directions in one click.

metodologia360.heading: Construcción Jurídica 360°
metodologia360.subheading: A comprehensive methodology to safeguard your company’s growth.
metodologia360.intro: We analyze your organization to identify strengths, opportunities, weaknesses, and threats within the applicable legal framework. Based on this diagnosis, we quantify risks and design a strategic legal structure with the right instruments to provide legal certainty, prevent and remedy contingencies, and accelerate business growth.
metodologia360.cta: See how we apply the 360 Methodology to your company

analisis.title: Organizational Analysis
analisis.description: We study your company’s structure to understand how it is organized and operates.

riesgos.title: Risk Identification
riesgos.description: We determine threats and quantify potential costs that may affect future growth.

estrategia.title: Strategic Legal Planning
estrategia.description: We design integrated and specific solutions aligned with the applicable legal framework.

resultados.title: Prevention & Strengthening
resultados.description: We provide legal certainty, prevent and remedy contingencies, and enhance organizational strengths.
